mainTopics.name: History
mainTopics.description: Explore historical events, civilizations, and influential figures throughout time
mainTopics.metaDescription: Study comprehensive history materials covering ancient civilizations, world wars, important historical figures, and major events that shaped our world.

mainTopics.name: Science
mainTopics.description: Discover scientific concepts, theories, and breakthroughs across various disciplines
mainTopics.metaDescription: Learn about scientific principles, discoveries, and theories across physics, chemistry, biology, astronomy, and more with our comprehensive study materials.

mainTopics.name: Geography
mainTopics.description: Learn about countries, landforms, cultures, and natural phenomena around the world
mainTopics.metaDescription: Study geography with materials covering countries, continents, physical features, climate zones, and cultural geography from around the world.

mainTopics.name: Literature
mainTopics.description: Explore literary works, authors, and movements throughout history
mainTopics.metaDescription: Dive into the world of literature with study materials on classic novels, famous authors, literary movements, poetry, and critical analysis.

mainTopics.name: Mathematics
mainTopics.description: Master mathematical concepts, formulas, and problem-solving techniques
mainTopics.metaDescription: Study mathematics with comprehensive materials covering algebra, geometry, calculus, statistics, and other mathematical concepts and applications.

mainTopics.name: Technology
mainTopics.description: Learn about technological innovations, computer science, and digital trends
mainTopics.metaDescription: Explore technology study materials covering computer science, programming, artificial intelligence, internet history, and modern technological innovations.

mainTopics.name: Arts
mainTopics.description: Discover art movements, famous artists, and artistic techniques throughout history
mainTopics.metaDescription: Study the arts with materials on famous artists, art movements, techniques, art history, and cultural significance of various art forms.

mainTopics.name: Entertainment
mainTopics.description: Explore film, television, and other entertainment media throughout history
mainTopics.metaDescription: Study materials about movies, TV shows, awards, actors, directors and the history of entertainment industry worldwide.
